scripts.build-android: react-native bundle --dev false --platform android --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output ./android/app/build/intermediates/assets/debug/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ./android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/debug && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.build-ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output iOS/main.jsbundle
